Package io.afero.sdk.device

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplyParams  
    AttributeWriter
    The AttributeWriter class provides an interface for writing DeviceModel attributes.
    AttributeWriter.Result
    Class that represents the final status of a write to a particular device attribute.
    ConclaveDeviceEventSource  
    DeviceCollection
    The DeviceCollection class manages the collection of DeviceModels associated with the active AferoClient account.
    DeviceModel
    This class manages the attribute state and events associated with a particular instance of an Afero peripheral device.

    DeviceModel.AttributeDebug

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AttributeWriter.AttributeWriteRequestFailure
    Exception returned via Observer.onError(Throwable) when any of the write requests fail at the Afero Cloud API level before reaching the device.
